selected_skills.name: read_diagram_value
selected_skills.purpose: To interpret the position of the clock hands from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the angle or position of the clock hands from the diagram to determine the time.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the interpreted time to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to match the interpreted time word to the given options and return the corresponding option label.
